value.title: How to translate Power BI reports (or any text) Live
value.excerpt: Have you ever had the need to work with a Power BI file in a different language that those you know? Or travelled somewhere where you couldnt speak the language?  In today's video, I will show you how to translate any text live. No more language barriers :)  Here you can download all the pbix files:

value.title: Import data from Facebook API in Power BI (Part 2)
value.excerpt: On Part 1 we showed you how to use the Power BI connector. In this video we skip the connector altogether and show you how to import data from the Facebook API into Power BI. We also show you how to get all comments from posts into Power BI. Enjoy!   Looking for a download file? Go to our Download Center:

value.title: Insert blank rows at each category in Power Query
value.excerpt: Have you ever wanted to have a blank row after each category or subcategory, so you can visualize your data in a table? Enjoy"  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1
